      • logout

        public static void logout()
        this method is being activate when the user press on the logout button or exits the main window. if he presses on the logout button then the method updates the DB and display the login fram. if he presses the exit button then it only updates the DB

      • addBookToOrderList

        public static boolean addBookToOrderList(java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String username,
                                         float bookCost)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        adds a book order for a reader to the database. The method checks whether a reader had already purchased a book using SQL queries that are being sent to the database and updates it in case a reader hadn't already purchased the book he is trying to purchase. In addition, the method checks what payment agreement a user has, and if it's a "pay per view" kind of payment agreement, the method adds the cost of the book to his debt
        Parameters:
        title - - String. The title of the book
        username - - String. Username
        bookCost - - float. The cost of the desired book
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setNewPaymentArrangement

        public static void setNewPaymentArrangement(java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String uName,
                                            java.lang.String creditNum,
                                            java.lang.String expYear,
                                            java.lang.String expMonth,
                                            java.lang.String cvv,
                                            java.lang.String perType,
                                            java.lang.String periodNum,
                                            java.lang.String newPayment,
                                            boolean visFlag)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        The method updates relevant records according to following logic:
        If a user is already a periodic reader - extend his payment arrangement
        If a user is an interested reader - update his privilege into a reader and set arrangement
        Parameters:
        id -
        uName: - user name
        creditNum -
        expYear: - credit card expired year
        expMonth: - credit card expired month
        cvv: - 3-security-digits on user's credit card
        perType: - period type. If a new arrangement is periodic, set monthly or yearly values
        periodNum: - number of periods to set
        newPayment: - type of new payment arrangement defined
        visFlag: - if true means it's going to be a periodic reader
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • displaySearchReport

        public static void displaySearchReport(java.lang.String bid)
        this method gets a book id and bring from the database all the searches of this book then it filters the search results for the book that been searched in the last month them it display the results(after putting the in an array) on a graph
        Parameters:
        bid - the book id that the graph is about

      • displayOrderRankByScope

        public static void displayOrderRankByScope(java.lang.String scope,
                                           java.lang.String bid,
                                           java.lang.String bookName,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scopes)
        this method gets a book id,scope name and then gets a list with the number of orders for all the book in the scope(from lowest to highest) from the DB and check the place of the book with the bid we got. we also get an ArrayList of String with all the scope and the book's name in order to be able to call for other methods
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope name
        bid - the book's id
        bookName - the book's name
        scopes - list of all the scopes

      • displayOrderRank

        public static void displayOrderRank(java.lang.String bid,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scopes,
                                    java.lang.String bookName)
        this method gets a book id and then gets a list with the number of orders for all the book in the library(from lowest to highest) from the DB and check the place of the book with the bid we got. we also get an ArrayList of String with all the scope and the book's name in order to be able to call for other methods.
        Parameters:
        bid - the book's id
        scopes - list of all the scopes
        bookName - the book's name
